Deprecated API

Deprecated Interfaces
org.quickserver.net.server.Authenticator
          As of 1.4.6 use ClientAuthenticationHandler 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.quickserver.net.server.TheClient.getAuthenticator()
          As of 1.4.6 use TheClient.getClientAuthenticationHandler() 
org.quickserver.net.server.QuickServer.getAuthenticator()
          since 1.4.6 use getClientAuthenticationHandler 
org.quickserver.net.server.ClientHandler.getBufferedWriter()
          since 1.4.5 use getOutputStream() 
org.quickserver.net.server.impl.BasicClientHandler.getBufferedWriter()
          since 1.4.5 use getOutputStream() 
org.quickserver.net.server.ClientHandler.getConnection(String)
          as of v1.4.5 use getServer().getDBPoolUtil().getConnection(id) 
org.quickserver.net.server.impl.BasicClientHandler.getConnection(String)
          as of v1.4.5 use getServer().getDBPoolUtil().getConnection(id) 
org.quickserver.net.server.ClientHandler.isConected()
          since 1.4.5 Use ClientHandler.isConnected() 
org.quickserver.net.server.impl.BasicClientHandler.isConected()
          since 1.4.5 Use BasicClientHandler.isConnected() 
org.quickserver.net.server.ClientHandler.sendSystemMsg(String, boolean)
          Use ClientHandler.sendSystemMsg(java.lang.String), since it uses Logging. 
org.quickserver.net.server.impl.BasicClientHandler.sendSystemMsg(String, boolean)
          Use BasicClientHandler.sendSystemMsg(java.lang.String), since it uses Logging. 
org.quickserver.net.server.TheClient.setAuthenticator(Authenticator)
          As of 1.4.6 use TheClient.setClientAuthenticationHandler(org.quickserver.net.server.ClientAuthenticationHandler) 
org.quickserver.net.server.QuickServer.setAuthenticator(String)
          since 1.4.6 use setClientAuthenticationHandler 
org.quickserver.net.qsadmin.QSAdminServer.setAuthenticator(String)
          since 1.4.6 use setClientAuthenticationHandler
